key_risks: Intense competition from larger players like SAP, Oracle, and Trimble, as well as emerging startups
Regulatory and geopolitical risks due to changing international trade policies and customs regulations
Cybersecurity threats due to handling sensitive logistics and trade data
Dependence on logistics and transportation customers for recurring revenue
